sentences: Lydian Nadhaswaram is an young Indian musician from Chennai, Tamil Nadu.
In 2019, he appeared on The World's Best on CBS and won, earning a prize money of $1 million.
Lydian spent 4 years studying at KM Music Conservatory, a higher education institution founded in 2008 by the AR Rahman Foundation.

In September 2019, it was announced that Lydian would make his debut as a film composer with the Indian Malayalam language fantasy film Barroz: Guardian of D'Gama's Treasure, directed by Mohanlal, starring himself in the lead.
